essentialInfoText: Dress code: We will be wearing our best outfits for our special day. Please join us with an evening outfit.
morningAfternoonText: If you're not used to the Spanish timetable, you might want to get yourself a big breakfast and lunch!!!
ceremonyLocation: San Juan de la Cruz Church
ceremonyText: We will have a traditional Roman Catholic Wedding ceremony
cocktailText: Some nibbles and drinks will be waiting for you at our reception place, just a couple of minutes walk from the church
danceText: Dance and drink all you'd like with live music and 3 hours of open bar
endText: The party finishes at 4am - we hope you will have had an amazing time!
